channel.title: Backgrounds of music
channel.description:
Hosted by John Brownlee, this series seeks to provide in-depth discussion of important music.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Opera
item.description: The fifteenth episode of this series discusses operatic recordings of great historic interest, including Mozart's Cosi Fan Tutti.
item.dc:creator: Brownlee, John, 1901-1969
item.dc:subject: Mozart, Wolfgang Amadeus, 1756-1791
